name: CSE395 Haptic Navigation
tagline: We created a haptic navigation device for disabled and old person as a part of our university project
body:
This repository is for CSE395 course of Gebze Technical University Computer engineering Faculty.

## Project Description
We created a haptic navigation device for disabled and old person as a part of our university project.

## Project Modules
1. [Hardware](https://github.com/kasimsuzen/CSE395-Project-1/tree/master/Hardware)
2. [Server](https://github.com/kasimsuzen/CSE395-Project-1/tree/master/Server)
3. [Interface](https://github.com/kasimsuzen/CSE395-Project-1/tree/master/Interface)

## Who We Are
1. Kasım Süzen
2. Ali İslam Ekşi
3. Halil İbrahim Oymacı
4. Hüseyin Berk Cüre
5. Hüseyin Coşkun
6. Yavuz Şen
7. Samet Yüksel
8. Muhammed Tasin Neciyullah Yagan (Although this person is not participated)
